{{cpp/filesystem/path/title|root_name}}
{{cpp/filesystem/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
path root_name() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the root name of the generic-format path. If the path (in generic format) does not include root name, returns {{c|path()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The root name of the path.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::filesystem;
 
int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "Current root name is: " &lt;&lt; fs::current_path().root_name() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
Current root name is: "C:"
}}
